Articles.Content:
[ZEED-woah] Noun, an exotic plant found in jungle areas of Kerbin.

nvghwy

[NIV-GWEE]

It's a....rare computer GPU based on a NVIDIA. 

ldytgf (sorry, i used two fingers with my eyes closed and that was the result. Good luck ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) )

[i-Deye-teehf] Sigma origins. Translates to "Onions" [No joke]

Odtudwoh

[odd-a-tud-woah] Noun, a type of vegetable similar to a potato in everything except color.

bhvuyee

[buh-voo-yee] Exclamation of excitement. Usually used in place of words similar to "cowabunga"

funakyet

(FUnAkyeet) the common reaction when your SSTO just badly dosnt make it to orbit

poiuyt

[Puoy-Ayete] Sigma origins. Translates to "The lower level"

Risxnuqa

[Ris-khnu-ka] Spanish word with unknown origins meaning "cute lynx"

dhjigog

[Duh-ji-gog] Refers to the act of two collision meshes getting stuck inside each other in video games. Unpleasant to pronounce and experience.

Kjgnng

(k-JIGN-ng)

*noun*:

A particularly lethal pathogen mutated from simple rice DNA.

srtdkj

Ste-ed-kuj

noun:

a faithful star-nosed mole

ahudso

[a-HOOD-zo]

*adjective:*

The downright opposite of clean.

esrfgp

es-urf-gup

A half hearted dog barking.

plmoknijb

Plmoknijb [ple-MOCK-neeb]: Finordiswedic word for an idiot who trips and falls on his face in a lava flow during a volcanic eruption.

awedd

[Aye-wid] Verb. To betray your leader voluntarily, by expressing violence.

Laecodso

[Luckatried] Adjective. Pronunciation [luck-a-tried]. Someone or something that tried to be lucky or to succeed in life, but ultimately failing in the process.

Example: Such a luckatried fool would ever buy 30 lottery tickets in one go, now he's broke.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T17:28:05Z" title="04/25/2015 05:28  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by HoloYolo**

> 
> [Luckatried] Adjective. Someone or something that tried to be lucky or to succeed in life, but ultimately failing in the process.
> Example: Such a luckatried fool would ever buy 30 lottery tickets in one go, now he's broke.

Take a look at [the game rules](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116045-Invent-a-Word%21?p=1847503&viewfull=1#post1847503), please ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

(I shall continue from the last applicable entry)

[lay-COD-so] Adjective, used to describe a person who lays around and plays Call of Duty.

nbnjuher
[NUB-in-JEW-her] Adjective, used to describe an inexperienced Jewish female who plays Call of Duty. Seldom used.

Error!

hyoperator

hi-op-er-a-tor

noun:

A greeting given to a telephone operator.

ckshtkh (have fun:D)

Ckshtkh [shhhhh] - *onomatopoeia*: the 1% of television static that is actually produced by radiation from the Sun.

I coulda sworn I posted a word before. Anyway, here's one now:

keghf

[keg-eff] Noun, a type of ancient Norse party where copious amounts of alcohol are consumed.

ifnfndfs

[EIf-in-ee-ef-in-edd-ifs] Sigma origins. Translates to "Upper left toad"

Idehkxesodkoh

[id-eh-kse-so-do-koh] Kerbalinticarilcicician, translates to English as "A word someone can not come up with a definition for."

poiuytrewqlkjhgfdsamnbvcxz
Te-hue-rism : Act of high lvl trolling
